Package com.osoc6.OSOC6.util

Class SpelUtil

java.lang.Object
com.osoc6.OSOC6.util.SpelUtil
@Component("spelUtil") public final class SpelUtil extends Object
This class helps with authorization. It's methods can be used in SpEL expressions.
